T01D1109:1b-3: khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa /
T01D1109:1b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1109:1b-5: bdag ni ston pa gzhan [dd] spangs nas //
T01D1109:1b-6: bcom ldan khyod la skyabs mchis pa //
T01D1109:1b-7: de ci'i slad du zhe na khyod //
T01D1109:1b-8: skyon mi mnga' la yon tan ldan //
T01D1109:1b-9: gang phyir 'jig rten skyon la dga' //
T01D1109:1b-10: yon tan 'dzin par zhen pas na //
T01D1109:1b-11: skyon yang yon tan ltar mthong nas //
T01D1109:1b-12: gzhan la skyabs su mchis par gyur //
T01D1109:1b-13: khyab 'jug dbang phyug la sogs pa //
T01D1109:1b-14: de la skye bo dga' dad pas //
T01D1109:1b-15: de yi yon tan gang bsgrags pa //
T01D1109:1b-16: khyod kyi bstan la de dag skyon //
T01D1109:1b-17: lha chen khros pa'i mda' gcig gis //
T01D1109:1b-18: grong khyer sum brtsegs bsregs zhes gda' //
T01D1109:1b-19: khyod kyi ye shes mda' chen gyis //
T01D1109:1b-20: khro ba'i sems nyid nges par bsregs //
T01D1109:1b-21: lha chen gyis ni 'dod pa dag / bsregs nyes pas na phyir yang drangs //
T01D1109:1b-22: khyod kyi ye shes zhugs kyis ni //
T01D1109:1b-23: 'dod pa rtsad bcad bsregs nas bton //
T01D1109:1b-24: lha chen thig le'i mchog ma la //
T01D1109:2a-2: bdud kyi bu mo sgeg mo yis //
T01D1109:2a-3: khyod kyi ba spu'i rtse ma g-yos //
T01D1109:2a-4: lha chen phyed ni chung ma bas //
T01D1109:2a-5: dur ba yis kyang thub ma lags //
T01D1109:2a-6: khyod ni bde bar bgyid pa yi //
T01D1109:2a-7: 'dod pa nyid kyis rmongs ma gyur ;
T01D1109:2a-8: /'khor lo mdung thung can dag gis //
T01D1109:2a-9: bdud stobs de las rgyal mi nus //
T01D1109:2a-10: khyod ni 'khor lo mdung med par //
T01D1109:2a-11: byams pa'i mtshon gang lags pas rgyal //
T01D1109:2a-12: rgan pos khyab 'jug mda' yis bsnun //
T01D1109:2a-13: lha chen mgrin pa sngo gyur pas //
T01D1109:2a-14: lha 'di gnyis la gnod bgyid mchis //
T01D1109:2a-15: mgon khyod gnod bgyid bral ba lags //
T01D1109:2a-16: khyab 'jug mi thung gzugs bsgyur nas //
T01D1109:2a-17: g-yo thabs kyis ni stobs ldan bslus //
T01D1109:2a-18: khyod ni g-yo yang mkhyen gyur la //
T01D1109:2a-19: gzhan dag la yang slu mi mdzad //
T01D1109:2a-20: mgon khyod rdzu 'phrul tsam blang gi //
T01D1109:2a-21: rmad byung gang gis mthong ba des //
T01D1109:2a-23: 'phye bo mchi ba bzhin du mthong //
T01D1109:2a-24: gzhon nu tshangs par spyod pa na //
T01D1109:2a-25: drug ldan ma dang lhan cig spyod //
T01D1109:2a-26: khyod kyis 'khrig pa'i sbyor ba bdun //
T01D1109:2a-27: thal ba bzhin du bgyis par gyur //
T01D1109:2a-29: bdag gcig yin par smra zhes grag / de nyid gzigs khyod 'jig rten dang //
T01D1109:2b-0: @2b de yang las las skyes zhes bstan //
T01D1109:2b-1: brgya byin gyis ni bshol med ma //
T01D1109:2b-2: mthong nas 'dod pas rmongs zhes grag / dpa' khyod 'dod pa nyid kyis ni //
T01D1109:2b-3: ma rmongs slad du btsun mo btang //
T01D1109:2b-4: sgra gcan lag pas zla ba yang //
T01D1109:2b-5: dbang med par ni mid pa lags //
T01D1109:2b-6: mnga' brnyes khyod la sems can gang ;
T01D1109:2b-7: / dbang med bgyid pa de ma mchis //
T01D1109:2b-8: mi dbang dga' byed gos sred sogs //
T01D1109:2b-9: nags tshal nas ni phyir yang mchis //
T01D1109:2b-10: bde bar gshegs khyod dben pa yi //
T01D1109:2b-11: bdud rtsis ngoms las phyir mi byon //
T01D1109:2b-12: mchod sbyin la ni phyugs 'gums par //
T01D1109:2b-13: drang srong rnams ni smra zhes grag / sdig med khyod kyis grog ma la'ang //
T01D1109:2b-14: gnod ba bgyid par rjes ma gnang //
T01D1109:2b-15: gzhan dag rang don mchod sbyin la //
T01D1109:2b-16: gzhan gyi srog gi sbyin sreg byed //
T01D1109:2b-17: gzhan gyi don du khyod gcig pu //
T01D1109:2b-18: rang gi srog gis sbyin sreg mdzad //
T01D1109:2b-19: drang srong dmod me mi bzad pas //
T01D1109:2b-20: skye bo mang po bsregs par 'gyur //
T01D1109:2b-21: khyod kyis ye shes me yis ni //
T01D1109:2b-22: skye bo rnams kyi skye rgyu bsregs //
T01D1109:2b-23: rgyas pa dran pa'i mthu chung bas //
T01D1109:2b-24: mang po bgyis pa'i tshig dag ni //
T01D1109:2b-26: thub pa khyod kyi kun kyang min //
T01D1109:2b-27: drang srong dmod pa grub pa las //
T01D1109:2b-28: dka' thub grub par rjes su dpag /
T01D1109:2b-29: mgon khyod thugs rje grub pa las //
T01D1109:2b-30: dka' thub grub par rjes su dpag / lha chen 'dod pa can gyi mtshan //
T01D1109:2b-31: drang srong rnams kyi dmod pas lhung //
T01D1109:2b-32: khyod kyis phung khrol mtha' dag gi //
T01D1109:2b-33: rtsa ba 'dod pa nyid lhung bgyis //
T01D1109:2b-34: gling las skyes sogs phal cher ni //
T01D1109:2b-35: gzhan gyis gang smras smra bar bgyid //
T01D1109:2b-36: khyod kyis thun mong ma yin chos //
T01D1109:2b-37: rang gis thugs su chud nas bstan //
T01D1109:2b-38: mu stegs can gyi rig byed tshig / dben pa kho nar smra bar bgyid //
T01D1109:2b-39: khyod kyis bsgrags nas seng ge yi //
T01D1109:2b-40: sgra yis chos dag ston par mdzad //
T01D1109:2b-41: grangs can bha ra dva dza ni //
T01D1109:2b-42: de nyid mthong yang dpyid ldan la //
T01D1109:2b-43: yongs su chags kyi gtso khyod kyi //
T01D1109:2b-44: slob ma'ang bud med nyid ma chags //
T01D1109:2b-45: 'ug pa pas ni dman pa las //
T01D1109:2b-46: khyad par can la sbyin zhes bstan //
T01D1109:2b-47: mgon po khyod ni thugs rje yis //
T01D1109:2b-48: khyi la'ang sbyin par bya zhes gsungs //
T01D1109:2b-49: lus kyi dka' thub bgyis pa yis //
T01D1109:3a-0: @3a * // khyod ni thugs kyi dka' thub kyis //
T01D1109:3a-1: mdud pa 'jig par bzhed pa lags //
T01D1109:3a-2: rtog ge pa dag dngos po rnams //
T01D1109:3a-3: ltos pa med par grub par 'tshal //
T01D1109:3a-4: tshig dbang khyod kyis cung zad kyang //
T01D1109:3a-5: mi ltos med ces legs par gsungs //
T01D1109:3a-6: ne tsos nyi ma brtol nas ni //
T01D1109:3a-7: thar pa mchis par bshad ces grag / khyod ni mya ngan 'das brnyes la //
T01D1109:3a-8: gang du yang ni gshegs ma mchis //
T01D1109:3a-9: thar pa rgyud gzhan skyed pa dang //
T01D1109:3a-10: ne tsos lam gzhan song bar gyur //
T01D1109:3a-11: khyod nyid lam gang nas gshegs pa //
T01D1109:3a-12: de nyid nas ni slob ma'ang mchi //
T01D1109:3a-13: khyab 'jug dag gis bud med ni //
T01D1109:3a-14: stong phrag drug cu yongs bzung gyur //
T01D1109:3a-16: bdag gi med cing yongs 'dzin med //
T01D1109:3a-17: ka shi mdzes dga' mo la ni //
T01D1109:3a-18: rgyas pa yongs chags rnam par 'gyur //
T01D1109:3a-19: khyod khab bzhugs na'ang phung khrol ba'i //
T01D1109:3a-20: gdon gyis dbang po rmongs ma gyur //
T01D1109:3a-21: rgyas pa 'dod gdungs g-yen spyo bas //
T01D1109:3a-22: bud med kyi ni rdog pas bsnun //
T01D1109:3a-23: khyod ni khyim par bzhugs na yang //
T01D1109:3a-25: dga' byed chung ma'i don gyi phyir //
T01D1109:3a-26: rgya mtsho'i pha rol son ces grag / khyod kyis bud med stong phrag ni //
T01D1109:3a-27: brgyad cu spangs nas nags su gshegs //
T01D1109:3a-28: rna can 'thab dka' la sogs la //
T01D1109:3a-29: khyab 'jug gis ni gnod pa brtsams //
T01D1109:3a-30: sems can rnams la phan bzhed pa //
T01D1109:3a-31: khyod kyis srog kyang btang ba mdzad //
T01D1109:3a-32: khyab 'jug gis ni sgyu byas nas //
T01D1109:3a-33: gom gsum gyis phrogs gang yin pa'i //
T01D1109:3a-34: sa de nges par thar bzhed pa //
T01D1109:3a-35: khyo kyis rtsa bzhin btang bar gyur //
T01D1109:3a-36: dga' byed srog gcod byed pa'i mdas //
T01D1109:3a-37: 'jig rten rgyal rigs med byas nas //
T01D1109:3a-38: grags pa thob pa gang yin de //
T01D1109:3a-39: khyod kyi bstan la grags pa min //
T01D1109:3a-40: sgra ngan dang ni skya bseng dag / gang gi phyir ni g-yul bkye ba'i //
T01D1109:3a-41: dpal de khyod kyis 'khri shing ni //
T01D1109:3a-42: gdug pa bzhin du spangs nas gshegs //
T01D1109:3a-43: khyod kyi bstan pa rnyed pa na //
T01D1109:3a-44: thang shing nags na lha chen po //
T01D1109:3a-45: rnal 'byor dbang phyug spyod pa po //
T01D1109:3a-46: de ni mi shes spyod par bas //
T01D1109:3a-47: dbang po gshol med byi bo zhes //
T01D1109:3a-48: bram ze da dung bar du sgrogs //
T01D1109:3a-49: khyod kyis 'bras bu mchog brnyes pa'i //
T01D1109:3b-0: grags @3b pa brgya byin sgrogs par gyur //
T01D1109:3b-1: khyab 'jug dag ni nag bkra bos //
T01D1109:3b-2: bred 'thoms gyur nas kun gtong gi //
T01D1109:3b-3: khri yi 'og tu zhugs par gyur //
T01D1109:3b-4: gtso khyod kun du bsnyengs mi mnga' //
T01D1109:3b-5: skye dgu'i bdag po rang nyid kyi //
T01D1109:3b-6: bu mo dang ni 'khrig ces thos //
T01D1109:3b-7: thub pa khyod kyi slob ma yang //
T01D1109:3b-8: tshangs par spyod pa skyon ma mchis //
T01D1109:3b-9: bram ze rnams ni dge sdig dag / sbyin pa len cing 'pho bar smra //
T01D1109:3b-10: khyod kyis byas pa chud mi za //
T01D1109:3b-11: ma byas pa dang phrad med gsungs //
T01D1109:3b-12: ser skyas bdag gi mtshan nyid ni //
T01D1109:3b-13: shes dang ldan pa rab tu brtags //
T01D1109:3b-14: khyod kyis de ltar yin na bdag / mi rtag nyid dang ldan zhes bstan //
T01D1109:3b-15: gzegs zan gyis ni shes las bdag / gzhan dang khyad par yongs su brjod //
T01D1109:3b-16: khyod kyis de ni shes med na //
T01D1109:3b-18: gcer bus lus kyi tshad bzhin du //
T01D1109:3b-19: srog ni zhum dang rgyas par smra //
T01D1109:3b-20: khyod kyis de ni phyogs gcig na //
T01D1109:3b-22: bram zes 'gro ba rnams kyi rgyu //
T01D1109:3b-23: skyes bu rtag pa yin zhes bstan //
T01D1109:3b-24: khyod kyis rtag pa zhes bya ba'i //
T01D1109:3b-25: rgyu ni ci yang med ces gsungs //
T01D1109:3b-26: bdag nyid chen po dug can pa'i //
T01D1109:3b-27: sras po stong phrag drug cu dag / ser skyas bltas pa tsam gyis bsregs //
T01D1109:3b-28: de la'ang khyod ni thugs rje mdzad //
T01D1109:3b-29: ser skya de nyid rig pas ni //
T01D1109:3b-30: gtso las 'gro ba skye bar bshad //
T01D1109:3b-31: khyod kyi 'gro ba'i skye ba ni //
T01D1109:3b-32: nyon mongs las las byung bar bsgrags //
T01D1109:3b-33: ser skya la sogs thar pa yi //
T01D1109:3b-34: bdag ni srid pa'i rgyu zhes zer //
T01D1109:3b-35: khyod ni zhi bar gshegs gyur nas //
T01D1109:3b-36: zhugs gum lta bur bgrang du med //
T01D1109:3b-37: mu stegs byed pa kha cig ni //
T01D1109:3b-38: thar pa 'gro dang ldan zhes smra //
T01D1109:3b-40: khyod kyis thugs su chud nas bstan //
T01D1109:3b-41: gcer bus kun dga' ra ba sogs //
T01D1109:3b-42: rtsig pa sdig pa'i rgyu zhes zer //
T01D1109:3b-43: thams cad mkhyen pa khyod nyid ni //
T01D1109:3b-44: de nyid bsod nams rgyu zhes gsungs //
T01D1109:3b-45: lus las lus gzhan dag tu ni //
T01D1109:3b-46: phra ba'i srog ni 'pho zhes grag / khyod kyi lus las gzhan gyur ba'i //
T01D1109:3b-47: srog ni yod pa min zhes gsungs //
T01D1109:3b-48: khros pas g-yul ngor bsad na ni //
T01D1109:4a-2: mgon po khyod kyis gnas skabs de'i //
T01D1109:4a-3: sems ni ngan 'gro yin zhes gsungs //
T01D1109:4a-4: skya bseng bu ni brjod byas na //
T01D1109:4a-5: bsod nams 'gyur zhes so sor smra //
T01D1109:4a-6: gang zhig bgrod min bgrod byed pa //
T01D1109:4a-7: de dag khyod kyi bstan la smad //
T01D1109:4a-8: skem byed dbang po nye dbang po //
T01D1109:4a-9: drag po la sogs 'jigs pa dang //
T01D1109:4a-10: bsdigs phyir mtshon cha rtag tu thogs //
T01D1109:4a-11: khyod bsnyengs bral zhing bsdigs mi mdzad //
T01D1109:4a-12: khyod ni sus kyang mi bsnyengs la //
T01D1109:4a-13: su la'ang bsdigs par mi mdzad pas //
T01D1109:4a-14: khyod nyid gcig pu mtshon mi bsnams //
T01D1109:4a-16: smra po nyon mongs bcas pa'i tshig / rig byed la sogs tshig dag ni //
T01D1109:4a-18: khyod kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung //
T01D1109:4a-19: gzhan gyi bstan bcos gzhan dag ni //
T01D1109:4a-20: phal cher snga phyi 'gal ba las //
T01D1109:4a-21: khyod nyid kyi ni gzhung lugs dag /
T01D1109:4a-22: thog ma bar mthar skyon ma mchis //
T01D1109:4a-23: chos 'dod pa dag dmangs rigs la //
T01D1109:4a-24: blo gros sbyin par bya min zer //
T01D1109:4a-25: khyod ni gdol pa rnams la yang //
T01D1109:4a-26: thugs rjes dam chos ston par mdzad //
T01D1109:4a-27: ljon shing bzang po rnams spangs nas //
T01D1109:4a-28: ngan pa la ni su zhig brten //
T01D1109:4a-29: 'dod chags bral brnyes khyod bzhugs na //
T01D1109:4a-30: mkhas pa su zhig ston gzhan 'dud //
T01D1109:4a-31: ser skyas yul rnams la spyad bzhin //
T01D1109:4a-32: ye shes 'gyur mchi sdig bral ba //
T01D1109:4a-33: khyod kyis kun nas nyon mongs la //
T01D1109:4a-34: thar pa ga la yod ces gsungs //
T01D1109:4a-35: bsod nams byas pa'i tshogs dag ni //
T01D1109:4a-36: sems can rnams la yongs bsngo bar //
T01D1109:4a-37: bcom ldan khyod kyis gang gsungs pa //
T01D1109:4a-38: de gzhan bstan bcos las ma bshad //
T01D1109:4a-39: lha rten dang ni mchod sbyin la //
T01D1109:4a-40: sems can gsod par byed pa gang //
T01D1109:4a-42: khyod kyi bstan la de dag smad //
T01D1109:4a-43: gang zhig srog chags la rtag gnod //
T01D1109:4a-44: de la chos nyid ga la yod //
T01D1109:4a-45: gtso bo khyod kyis rang nyid kyi //
T01D1109:4a-46: srog gis sems can legs par bsrungs //
T01D1109:4a-48: gang zhig bden dang mi slu dang //
T01D1109:4a-49: tshangs par spyod dang dul ba dang //
T01D1109:4b-0: brtser ldan dam chos lags par @4b dgongs //
T01D1109:4b-1: rig byed mtha' la 'byams pas kyang //
T01D1109:4b-2: g-yul ngor dgra mngon 'ongs bsad ces //
T01D1109:4b-3: 'jig rten smra yi khyod kyis ni //
T01D1109:4b-4: dgra la'ang snying rje bya zhes gsungs //
T01D1109:4b-5: gzhon nus rang gi zhang po la //
T01D1109:4b-6: mdung gis bsnun zhes bka' mchid gda' //
T01D1109:4b-7: dpa' bo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa'i //
T01D1109:4b-8: dra ba shes rab mtshon gyis dral //
T01D1109:4b-9: khyab 'jug gis ni rang nyid kyi //
T01D1109:4b-10: slas kyang yongs su bskyab ma nus //
T01D1109:4b-11: gtso bo khyod kyis sems can kun //
T01D1109:4b-12: bskyab pa'i slad du brtson pa lags //
T01D1109:4b-13: rgan pos sbyar ba'i 'jigs shes nas //
T01D1109:4b-14: khyab 'jug gis ni bcom brlag btang //
T01D1109:4b-15: thub pa khyod la bsnyengs bgyid gang //
T01D1109:4b-16: sems can de ni 'ga' ma mchis //
T01D1109:4b-17: khyab 'jug gis ni gnyen 'dun dag / le lan gyis ni gtugs par gyur //
T01D1109:4b-18: khyod kyi gnyen 'dun thams cad ni //
T01D1109:4b-19: 'khor ba las ni rnam par sgrol //
T01D1109:4b-20: mu stegs can gyi gzhung lugs la //
T01D1109:4b-21: ji ltar ji ltar rnam bsams pa //
T01D1109:4b-22: de lta de ltar mgon khyod la //
T01D1109:4b-23: bdag gi sems ni dad par gyur //
T01D1109:4b-24: de ltar thams cad mkhyen min pa'i //
T01D1109:4b-25: grub mtha'i skyon gyi brlag sems ldan //
T01D1109:4b-26: bsam brlag rnams kyis skyon med pa'i //
T01D1109:4b-27: ston pa khyod kyang mi mthong ngo //
T01D1109:4b-28: 'jig rten lha dang bram ze dang //
T01D1109:4b-30: sdang bar smra ba rang skyon nyid //
T01D1109:4b-31: ci phyir sems par byed ce na //
T01D1109:4b-32: gang slang khyod kyi bstan pa ni //
T01D1109:4b-33: bde bas bde nyid thob bgyid pa //
T01D1109:4b-34: de slad smra ba'i seng khyod kyi //
T01D1109:4b-36: khyod kyi yon tan yang dag pa //
T01D1109:4b-37: rnam pa 'di ltar rab brjod pas //
T01D1109:4b-38: bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des //
T01D1109:4b-39: 'gro ba'i 'jig rten khyod 'drar shog / mgon po khyad par 'phags bstod pa //
T01D1109:4b-40: bton pas bdag gis dge bsags pa //
T01D1109:4b-41: gang yin des ni 'gro ba kun //
T01D1109:4b-42: byang chub lam la gzhol gyur cig /
T01D1109:4b-43: khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa slob dpon mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T01D1109:4b-45: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dzny'a de wa dang /
T01D1109:4b-46: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur //
